entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BLAZOR: Increase Debouce Time For Render #50494
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50493
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50492
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #50491
  • Allow additional Tags for activity creation #50488
  • RequestQuery won't be logged if it's the only logging field selected #50487

Closed

  • How to persist data on Blazor SSR + WASM Client in .NET 8 preview 6 #49448
    8.0-rc1
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50435
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50436
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50449
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #50470
  • Faild to load {Assembly}.styles.css with a specific route in .net 8 Blazor Web App #50471

PullRequests

Created

  • Update selenium #50486
    area-blazor

Updated

  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    community-contribution, feature-templates, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2258703 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Update CertificateLoader.cs #50474
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
  • Rename internal UseAck to UseStatefulReconnect #50407
    area-signalr
  • Document the coupling between KestrelServerLimits and *TransportOptions #50468
    area-networking
